group.description: A group name that contains multiple unique domains. For example, the 'product' group would contain the 'store-product' and 'product-catalog' domains, among others
group.x-prompt: What is the group?  For example, if you are creating a 'feature-store-product', the group would be 'product'

domain.description: The unique domain that this data access library will focus on
domain.x-prompt: What is the domain?  For example, if you are creating a 'feature-store-product', the domain would be 'store-product'
